Event.name: Pre_getting
Event.definition: <def-root>The state of the <fen>Recipient</fen> prior to the acquisition, i.e. before the <fen>Recipient</fen> gains possession of the <fen>Theme</fen>. </def-root>

Arg.name: Recipient
Arg.definition: <def-root>The individual that is about to gain a possession.</def-root>

Arg.name: Theme
Arg.definition: <def-root>The entity which is about to be acquired by the <fen>Recipient</fen>. </def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition: <def-root>A description of the way that the <fen>Recipient</fen> has the <fen>Theme</fen></def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE indicates the <fen>Time</fen> when the Post_getting event occurs. </def-root>
